string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item: Bugfix: When there were days with more than 10 exercises, the sorting was wrong
Bugfix: During supersets, you couldn\'t click "Start Next Set Early" if the displayed exercise had no rest
Defaults the display to whichever alternate exercise you most recently completed
Edit weight and reps with the keyboard
Enable "infinite" challenges which do not have a defined number of sets or reps, just to failure
Add a timer for "infinite" challenges which are time based
Can now refresh exercises without descriptions
Not fixed: rotating the screen returns to the first exercise of the day
Not fixed: rotating the screen resets changes to reps/weight for incomplete sets
New changelog to tell you what has changed
Rest days are shown on the calendar
Challenge workouts which are for a completion of total reps instead of sets
Cleaner transition between supersets when there is no rest
Reps default to the number of reps for the day rather than the number completed the last time the exercise was completed
Support multiple exercises with the same name (or the same exercise) within the same workout day
Show the actual number of days in the workout on the calendar view
